data.title: State Water Board Approves Emergency Curtailment Regulation for Mill and Deer Creeks
data.excerpt: With climate change-fueled drought reducing precipitation to approximately half of normal levels across the Sacramento River basin, the State Water Resources Control Board adopted an emergency curtailment regulation for Mill and Deer Creeks in Tehama County.
data.author: Chach Sikes
